872420.name: Unworthy - Soundtrack
872420.description:
This is the Original Soundtrack for the game Unworthy. It was composed by Brian Havey (zminusone). It contains a bunch of mp3s. You can find the files in your Steam/steamapps/common/Unworthy folder.

Track List:
1. Prologue (4:46)
2. Little Lamb (2:16)
3. A Broken Bell (4:18)
4. The Boneyard (3:05)
5. Devourer of Light (2:51)
6. Catacombs of Ur (5:13)
7. The First Anvil (2:56)
8. The Hearth (2:15)
9. Cathedral of Ur (2:36)
10. Absolution (2:11)
11. The Undercity (3:35)
12. Rotten Bones (2:25)
13. Heir of Ambition (2:14)
14. Spire Dungeon (2:56)
15. Father of Darkness (2:48)
16. Venerable Spire (3:21)
17. Prelude to Flame (2:33)
18. Sword and Flame (4:07)
19. Thornvale (3:10)
20. A Dance with Death (3:40)
21. The Undone Palace (2:35)
22. Death's Gift (1:42)
23. Father of Thirst (2:26)
24. Sanctum of Shade (2:39)
25. The First Mother (2:57)
26. The Laboratory (1:46)
27. Avatar of Ur (3:57)
28. Godless Shrine (3:44)
29. The First Father (2:52)
30. Epilogue (2:46)
872420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
